name: http_basic_examples
description: FastEdge HTTP applications for integration tests - basic functionality

scripts.build:all: npm-run-all -p build:basic build:downstream-fetch build:headers build:http-responder build:variables-and-secrets
scripts.copy:wasm: npm-run-all -p copy:basic copy:downstream-fetch copy:headers copy:http-responder copy:variables-and-secrets
scripts.copy:basic: npx cross-env NAME=basic npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:downstream-fetch: npx cross-env NAME=downstream-fetch npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:headers: npx cross-env NAME=headers npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:http-responder: npx cross-env NAME=http-responder npm run mv:file
scripts.copy:variables-and-secrets: npx cross-env NAME=variables-and-secrets npm run mv:file
